_sText:
DR.MINI'S COURSE

MiniGame

Properties ---------- - **3 secret grenades** are hided in the map - more levels than in my older map [mg-citadel-course](http://gamebanana.com/css/maps/164268 "mg-citadel-course") - on finish map **gives** to player **250 points** - **SpawnKiller** will be activated in **45 seconds**(kills with **one hit**) - one **own texture** is used behind the spawn points - the map is **difficult** - **5 Win songs** plays on **random choose** when the player goes in the **finish room** - **Level 1** have now **teleports**, to don't die for **45 seconds** Required -------- - **The map need a NoBlock to play with more then one player** Bugs fixed ---------- - Point giver did small damage New things ---------- _There isn't anything new._ Music ----- - Taio Cruz feat. Flo Rida - Hangover - Far East Movement - Like a G6 - Flo Rida - Good Feeling - David Guetta - Where them Girls at - Sean Paul - She doesn't Mind Special Thanks -------------- - Unknown - Texture - VALVe - Source SDK-Hammer Editor - Larry Crossman - Testing/help ------------------------------------------------------------------

Please don't forget to write Comments, Rate and give me Feedback :D!

Have fun.
